name: Epic Chainsaw Dash (LudumDare49)
description:
[This is a LudumDare submission, cosider giving it a rating!]

Trees are falling down for some reason, so of course you have to cut thru them with your epic chainsaw!!

FEATURING: 

  • CHAINSAWS! 
  • TREES!
  • EXPLOSIONS! 
  • bugs 
  • AND MUCH MORE!

A game that never ends because I didn’t program win/lose conditions!

This is first time solo project for LD49, please don't expect too much :)

Code and visuals all mine (there are assets by https://edermunizz.itch.io/ I didn’t end up using), music is from the modern day music megapack by https://www.patreon.com/joelsteudler
